name: Purple Wizard Hijinks
description:
In Purple Wizard Hijinks, you play as a purple wizard who has to survive infinite waves of bandits for as long as possible. It is a very simple top-down shooter.

WASD / Arrow Keys to move around, Left Mouse Button to shoot.

Regular bandits are worth 1 point, dashers are worth 2 and knights are worth 3.

This is my first ever game, made entirely in Godot in the span of a few weeks. It has no sound effects, and very little replaybility. It's more of a test than anything, really, but I'm still posting it as some of my friends were curious about it.
